attributes.action: instruct the Royal Mint to cease making 1p & 2p coins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 1p & 2p coins are redundant, there is little if anything which costs such a small amount now and it cannot be cost effective to produce these coins anymore.
Many people just throw them away, even supermarkets are now ditching the .99p price tags in favour of the 'round pound' and everything could be priced at .95p if required.
The 5p coin is almost the same in size as the old 1/2p which was abolished back in the 1970s and can now take it's place as Britain's lowest monetary denomination.
It is time for the copper coins to be banished to history.
